query.name: fileUrl
query.description: link to download manifest json file

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/public/integrations/lazada')
request.add_api_parameter("manifestId", "106942011")
request.add_api_parameter("locationId", "dfb73c93-0213-491f-9707-9c8ad8515cc2")
request.add_api_parameter("subConId", "9330")
request.add_api_parameter("fileUrl", "http://downloadable_file.com")
request.add_api_parameter("traceId", "trace_id_should_be_here")
request.add_api_parameter("authToken", "Basic ...")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/public/integrations/lazada')
request.add_api_param('manifestId', '106942011')
request.add_api_param('locationId', 'dfb73c93-0213-491f-9707-9c8ad8515cc2')
request.add_api_param('subConId', '9330')
request.add_api_param('fileUrl', 'http://downloadable_file.com')
request.add_api_param('traceId', 'trace_id_should_be_here')
request.add_api_param('authToken', 'Basic ...')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
